title: Self Summary
shortDescription: Attract users with a short biography, photo, and social media links!
longDescription:
*Get summarized!*

Build your brand with this personalized biography and social media contact box!

## Features

- Profile photo uploading and Gravatar support.
- Social media links.
author: Cloudflare Labs
